name: Inner Struggle
description:
This game has been made for the BlackThornProd GameJam #3 Theme: Less Is More Controls

Left clic: attack
Right clic + hold: capture
directional keys: move

You need to capture an emotion before you can attack.

Description

Inner Struggle is  a game to play with your emotions.
Negative emotions are going to attack you.
You can either try to capture them to make them positive,
or either try to fight them with your positive emotions.

But be careful !!! The more positive emotion you have, the less lucide you will become ;)
Will you find the end of the maze ?

Discussion

We intend to go further and make this a real game. If you agree and want to support this project, we would really appreciate your feedback !

Futur devs planned (we will keep this up too date ;) )
  • More room variations
  • More diversity in emotion attacks (ranged, etc)
  • Evolving and collectible features
  • Boss fights !!!

Thank you for playing and see you later for more Inner struggle :)

The Bro'lab
